pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Park Geun-hye of South Korea | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with the President of South Korea Park Geun-hye.

The Prime Minister expressed concerns over the North Korean nuclear test. Prime Minister Trudeau reiterated Canada’s steadfast support for South Korea and Canada’s intention to work with the international community to respond to North Korean actions.
